      • searchCourse

        public static java.util.List<Course> searchCourse(java.lang.String keyword,
                                                  java.util.List<Course> rawList)
        Search in a course list by a keyword
        参数:
        keyword - the searching keyword (dark search)
        rawList - the list to be searched
        返回:
        the result list

      • searchTrainer

        public static java.util.List<Trainer> searchTrainer(java.lang.String name,
                                                    java.util.List<Trainer> rawList)
        Search for a trainer by his/her name
        参数:
        name - the trainer's name (dark search)
        rawList - the list to be searched
        返回:
        the result list
